    graph TD
    root["/"]
    root --> bin["/bin"]
    root --> etc["/etc"]
    root --> dev["/dev"]
    root --> home["/home"]
    root --> lib["/lib"]
    root --> var["/var"]
    root --> usr["/usr"]
    usr --> usrbin["/usr/bin"]
    usr --> usrlib["/usr/lib"]
    usr --> usrlocal["/usr/local"]
    var --> varlog["/var/log"]
